# Lula Tea E-commerce - Next.js Project Setup

## Project Overview
Modern, bilingual (EN/AR) e-commerce site for Lula Tea - Saudi premium tea brand selling 250g bags at 30 SAR with WhatsApp checkout integration.

## Technology Stack
- Next.js 14+ (App Router)
- React 18+ with TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- Supabase Auth
- PWA enabled
- AI chatbot ready
